document_data.name: Calcitro Burrow
document_data.mainbody: '''Calcitro Burrow''' was the mayor of [[Beluir]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: Due to his love of food and drink, Calcitro was a portly fellow. Most of his opponents took one look at him and dismissed him as a warrior, a mistake he took full advantage of.
document_data.Activities: As a member of the wealthy Burrow family, Calcitro helped manage their fruit plantation and several inns that they owned in the city.
document_data.History: Calcitro single-handedly dispatched a pair of [[giant]]s in his youth, granting him legendary warrior status in Beluir.
document_data.Possessions: Calcitro owned a nasty ''[[sword of sharpness|dagger of severing]]''.
